name: OR_CASE_PAT_DIFF_HOSP
description: This table is used for the Patient Operated in Different Hospital (I ORC 7905) item.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_DIFF_HOSP_C_NAME
columns.description: This field indicates whether or not the patient has had operations in a different hospital.
